name: subject-access-requests
title: Subject Access Requests
description: This dataset is an abridged version of the Information Management and Security Team Subject Access Requests Log. The log is used to record, track and report on the Subject Access Requests made to the FSA. A subject access request is the name given to a request made by an individual for personal data an organisation holds about them under the Data Protection Act.

resources.name: Subject Access Requests for 2016
resources.description: This dataset is an abridged version of the Information Management and Security Team Privacy Impact Assessments log. The log is used to record, track and report on the Privacy Impact Assessments (PIA) carried out in 2016.

fields.name: TotalNumOfDaysToRespond
fields.title: Total Number Of Days To Respond
